scenario_text.value: Hey, I haven’t thanked you two properly yet.
Huh? For what?
Whaddya mean, “For what?”

You helped us work things out! Me and Minoru
were running around like crazy...
Oh, that. No need to thank us.

But, like... It’s so annoying when Falcomon
tells me to be “reasonable.”
...we wanted to say thanks.

(Minoru’s really embarrassed. I can tell he’s
speaking from the heart.)

(I’m starting to feel embarrassed, too...
I could poke fun at him, or stay serious.)
(How should I respond to Minoru’s gratitude?)
Classic Minoru move!
Don’t mention it.
You’re welcome.
Classic Minoru move!

There you go again! I swear, it’s so dang
awkward when you get all serious!

Jeeze, Takuma, I was just trying to open up
a little!

It’s not very nice of you to reject him like
that.

I guess I’m the stupid one for trying to be
sincere then! Ugh!

(Was I rejecting him? I only meant to joke
around a little...)
Don’t mention it.

You don’t need to thank me. I did what any
friend would do.

It’s mainly just strange to see you acting
all serious and thanking me.

Way to make me feel weird about it. Can’t
really fault your logic, though...

In other words, you normally don’t show
enough consideration for those around you.

You should try being a little more grateful
and appreciative of other people.

What’s with you two? I just wanted to let
Takuma know how I felt.

Don’t tell me you two are going get into
another fight...

(They’re more like an old married couple
bickering at this point...)
You’re welcome.

You’re welcome.
But there’s nothing to thank us for.

Minoru and Falcomon, you take such good care
of each other.

You were the ones who decided to put in the
work to patch things up!
Oh, you two...

We never could have done it if it wasn’t for
you!
So at least let me say thank you, all right?
Any time! Heheh!

It’s almost time for breakfast, right?
I wonder what’s on the menu!
